snippet.title: Cobalt Core Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
From Rocket Rat Games and Brace Yourself Publishing comes Cobalt Core, a sci-fi roguelike deckbuilder with a unique single-axis combat system that will throw you for a loop. Many loops!

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/CobaltCoreSteam
Learn more: https://braceyourselfgames.com/cobalt-core

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/BYG_Vancouver
https://twitter.com/RocketRatGames
https://twitter.com/CobaltCoreGame

Join our Discord:
https://discord.gg/braceyourselfgames
